1@6.body: I saw it on the bitcoin subreddit. At first I thought it was another time traveler from the future posting there but noticed that someone really did make a decentralized internet that worked before my jaw dropped.

3@2.body: I think social networks and blogging platforms with crypto-currency integration would be cool. I imagine that someone who subscribes to a certain blogger could choose to donate certain amounts each day, week, or month through micro-transactions and tip bloggers through likes similar to how Patreon and TSU work.
Namecoin domain names or domain naming through protocols which build off of Namecoin's work would be a nice feature too even though this has probably already been mentioned.
